name: SPANISH GAS ASSOCIATION
goal: Promotion of use of gas as cleanest conventional energy. Promotion of efficient and safe use of gas. Training on gas transmission, distribution and use. Certification of gas-related products and personnel. Legislation, Regulation and Standardization related to gas chain.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Energy, Environment, Internal Market, Taxation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Objetivos 2030 de política energética y clima
Comercio de Emisiones
Códigos de Red Gas
Legislación mercado minorista
Combustibles para transporte
Legislación sobre impuestos a la energía
Legislación sobre mercados financieros (afección a energía)
Legislación sobre medio ambiente
